name: Fix My Spaceship
description:
Fix My Spaceship: A text-adventure splashed with a retro, sci-fi space feel including puzzles and mini-game mechanics. Throw in your best effort to learn the layout and then revisit the game to try and top the competitive leaderboard with your best speedrun!

Overcome the adversity of having your spaceship crash into a mars-like planet while scrambling to save your AI from a computer virus and then gathering the parts to repair the hyperdrive engine so that you can continue on your fabulous way.

Core Features:

- Easy-to-understand
- Minimalized-text
- Don't get lost! We have a map
- Hidden Easter Eggs to improve final score
- A competitive "Life"-adapted minigame
- Humorous antics
- A competitive leaderboard

Be sure to play through at least once, then try to speed-run the best possible time to challenge your friends!
